content: The Flint Chief is another rock boss in the game, that will try to use all its might in its attacks, so the moveset will seem familiar.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Flint Chief'.
The content is as follows:
The Flint Chief is another rock boss in the game, that will try to use all its might in its attacks, so the moveset will seem familiar.
